content: MLflow is an open-source platform for the machine learning life cycle, focusing on reproducibility, training, and deployment. It works with any language or platform, with clients in Python and Java, accessible through a REST API. MLflow is a tool created by the open-source community to address gaps in ML systems for reproducibility, model management, and deployment.

MLflow is an open source platform for the machine learning life cycle, focusing on reproducibility, training, and deployment. It is based on an open interface design and can work with any language or platform. MLflow is used for model packaging, decoupling the model type from the environment that executes the model.
